root.name: The Houchi Play
root.description: OverviewTaro Heibon is a 56 year old married man. He's also a 'super masochist' and wants to be treated like a pig, like a dog by cos-play girls. He's finally summoned the courage and needs your help.GameplayIn The Houchi Play the player controls Taro using his "butt shuffling" technique to close the distance on the girls. Periodically Taro must stop to rapidly consume alcohol. Taro will then power up and allow him to creep faster when the girls are distracted.Choose from nurses, swimmers, school girls and more.A rapid button pressing mini game similar to what you'd find in Work Time Fun, Bishi Bashi or similar collections.Houchi Play is fleshed out with multiple girls with different stats and behaviors and a basic XP based leveling system.TranslationWhile "The Houchi Play" works to some extent in American english, as 'Hoochie' can refer to a woman the term in Japanese refers to erotic sexual denial. A descriptive americanized title might be "The Blue Ball Game".
